name: B-Blocks
description:
B-blocks is a puzzle hypercasual game. You have to rich the other side of the screen placing the  blocks in the correct places.

Controls: Only Mouse. Use your mouse to use the buttons and to drag the blocks.

Game Version: Alpha 0.1

GamePlay:


Game Developer: Diana Ramos Garcia (@Dinorekkos)

Engineering on Interactive software and Videogames
